title: WTB/WTTF The N284 of Crane in REA N284 lot last night
author: ValKehl

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF The N284 of Crane in REA N284 lot last night
posts.post_content:
I was an under bidder in this lot of six N284 cards in REA last night:  [url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=98246[/url]

The only card in this lot I wanted is Crane for my collection of Washington N284s. If the winner of this lot does not intend to keep the Crane card, I'm a buyer or trader for it.

I will reach out once lot get in. I just want to make sure I have another shortstop 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
